name: EVANESCENCE SHORE: Where worries vanish
description:
EVANESCENCE SHORE Where worries vanish.

[WASD or arrow keys to move.]

A submission for the SCREAM SEAS Game Jam. This is a game about a person who traveled to a place named Evanescence Shore. The player does not know why he/she went there, but something lured him/her to the the place. It's a very short and straight-forward game so completing it won't take too much time.

Story inspired by H.P. Lovecraft 's sea anomalies and the game was made using Bitsy 3D Beta.
